title: "What is the purpose of Quantum Psychology and how does it differ from other forms of psychology?"
first_phrase: In this text, the author explains the purpose of Quantum Psychology and distinguishes it from other forms of psychology. Rather than making individuals "better" or fixing their issues, its purpose is to discover who you truly are. The last 200 tokens discuss the connection between Nisargadatta Maharaj and Quantum Psychology, and how the Advaita Vedanta path of unlearning is central to the process. The author highlights that the process is organized through internal questioning and enquiry, leading to a liberation of awareness until the enquirer-enquiree and awareness disappear. The text provides insights into Quantum Psychology and its core premises.
